item.description: Film followed by drinks or a bite to eat.Â  More details in the email that I sent Saturday evening.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby, across from the ticket window, 30 minutes before the film. I'll send my mobile number to anyone who signs up by 4PM Tuesday, in case you have any trouble finding the group.
